title: Onboarding - Explain First Bill
description: A new customer calls, confused about their first bill which includes prorated charges.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and retrieve their first billing statement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the correct customer and bill.

tasks.description: Clearly explain the different parts of the bill: the prorated charge for the partial first month and the charge for the next full month in advance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a simple and clear explanation of prorated billing.

tasks.description: Confirm the customer understands and is satisfied with the explanation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures customer satisfaction before ending the call.
